DataElement.preferredName: Vineland Adaptive Behavior Scales Gross Motor Raw Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Value representing the Gross Motor Raw Score of responses on the Vineland-3 Adaptive Behavior Scales form.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Vineland Adaptive Behavior Scales Gross Motor Skill Raw Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An instrument for evaluation of social functioning in individuals from preschool to 18 years old. Focusing on adaptive behaviors, the results are meant to support the diagnosis of intellectual and developmental disabilities._The ability to use large muscle groups for gross body movements. This developmental skill begins in infancy and early childhood._Not processed or refined._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

This developmental skill begins in infancy and early childhood.

The ability to use large muscle groups for gross body movements. This developmental skill begins in infancy and early childhood.
